publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7605.1 John Lamont: Antisocial Behaviour Frameworkâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-7605) in the name of Fergus Ewing, leave out from "the progress made" to end and insert "that, while progress is being made across a range of areas in improving community safety, the public must continue to be encouraged to report antisocial behaviour and that where examples of good practice exist these should be replicated as widely as possible."
